info.title: AIception Interactive
info.description: Here you can play & test & prototype all the endpoints using just your browser! Go ahead!

tags.name: language
tags.description: Speech to text, text to speech, natural language processing

post.summary: Image contains nudity or sexually explicit content? [ image_url -> id ]
post.description: Creates a new adult_content task that tells the if the image has nudity or sexual content.

get.summary: Gets the adult_content task [ id -> adult content task ]

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: An internal id for the task

200.description: The contents of the adult_content task.

post.summary: Create an artistic image [ image_url, style_url -> id ]
post.description: Given an image content and a style image create a new stylized image of the content.

requestBody.description: The content image and the style image

get.summary: Gets a artistic image by task id [ id -> artistic image task ]
get.description: The artistic_image will have the urls of the stylized images.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: An internal id for the task

200.description: The contents of the artistic_image task.

post.summary: What is that object? [ image_url -> id ]
post.description: Creates a new detect object task that recognizes the object in the image.

get.summary: Gets the detect_object task [ id -> detect object task]

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: An internal id for the task

200.description: The contents of the detect_object task.

post.summary: Find all faces in the image [ image_url -> id ]
post.description: Get a list of all the locations of the faces in the image.

get.summary: Gets the face task [ id -> face task ]

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: An internal id for the task

200.description: The contents of the face task.

post.summary: How old is the person in the image? [ image_url -> id ]
post.description: Creates a new face age task that approximates the age of the person in the image.

get.summary: Gets the face_age task [ id -> face age task ]

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: An internal id for the task

200.description: The contents of the face_age task.

answer.description: The answer you are looking for.

image_url.description: The url of the image that will be processed.

this_url.description: Use this url to get this task.
